titles.title: For the relief of Alexandre Malofienko, Olga Matsko, and their son, Vladimir Malofienko.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/3/2001--Introduced. Declares Alexandre Malofienko, Olga Matsko, and their son, Vladimir Malofienko to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act upon payment of the required visa fees.
